welcome_message_body: Welcome to Reading, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Skyline Chili
restaurants.description: Skyline Chili is a american restaurant located in Cincinnati.
restaurants.address: 8506 Reading Rd (at Galbraith Rd.), Cincinnati, OH 45215

restaurants.name: Wyoming Pastry Shop
restaurants.description: Wyoming Pastry Shop is a bakery located in Cincinnati.
restaurants.address: 505 Wyoming Ave (at Burns Ave.), Cincinnati, OH 45215

restaurants.name: Tēla Bar + Kitchen
restaurants.description: Tēla Bar + Kitchen is a gastropub located in Cincinnati.

restaurants.name: Gabby's Cafe
restaurants.description: Gabby's Cafe is a café located in Cincinnati.

restaurants.name: Amma's Kitchen
restaurants.description: Amma's Kitchen is a indian restaurant located in Cincinnati.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight shipments at RAF Station Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, with exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A large terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly British Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
